verses.verse: Hurry, <S%H430><s%> God, to deliver <S%H5337><s%> me. <S%H2363><s%> Come quickly to help <S%H5833><s%> me, <S%H3068><s%> Yahweh.

Let them be disappointed <S%H954><s%> and confounded <S%H2659><s%> who seek <S%H1245><s%> my soul. <S%H5315><s%> Let those who desire <S%H2655><s%> my ruin <S%H7451><s%> be turned <S%H5472><s%> back <S%H268><s%> in disgrace. <S%H3637><s%>
Let them be turned <S%H7725><s%> because <S%H6118><s%> of their shame <S%H1322><s%> Who say, <S%H559><s%> "Aha! <S%H1889><s%> Aha! <S%H1889><s%>"

Let all those who seek <S%H1245><s%> you rejoice <S%H7797><s%> and be glad <S%H8055><s%> in you. <S%H157><s%> Let those who love your salvation <S%H3444><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%> say, <S%H559><s%> "Let God <S%H430><s%> be exalted! <S%H1431><s%>"

But I am poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy. <S%H34><s%> Come to me quickly, <S%H2363><s%> God. <S%H430><s%> You are my help <S%H5828><s%> and my deliverer. <S%H6403><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> don't <S%H309><s%> delay.
